channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Bill Haley & His Comets

item.title: Bill Haley & His Comets - See You Later, Alligator
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
See You Later Alligator - Bill Haley and his Comets Originally recorded and written by Bobby Charles
We use this as an introduction to "12 Bar Blues" and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
In the Key Of C Maj
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D D or D DU D DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
